name: Jollof Rice
description: A beloved West African dish made with long-grain parboiled rice, tomatoes, onions, and various spices.

name: Pounded Yam and Egusi Soup
description: Smooth, stretchy pounded yam served with a thick, hearty melon seed soup.

name: Suya
description: Grilled meat skewers coated with spicy peanut mixture, often served with sliced onions and tomatoes.

name: Akara (Bean Cakes)
description: Deep-fried bean cakes made from black-eyed peas, onions, and other spices.

name: Boli (Grilled Plantain)
description: Ripe plantains grilled to perfection, often enjoyed with groundnut sauce.

name: Moi Moi (Bean Pudding)
description: A steamed bean pudding made from blended black-eyed peas, peppers, and spices.

name: Ofada Rice and Sauce
description: A unique variety of rice served with a spicy, pepper-rich sauce.

name: Banga Soup
description: A flavorful soup made from palm fruits, herbs, and spices.

name: Efo Riro (Spinach Stew)
description: A rich spinach stew made with tomatoes, peppers, and an assortment of meats and/or fish.

name: Pepper Soup
description: A spicy, broth-based soup filled with fish or meat and flavored with traditional spices.

name: Fufu and Okra Soup
description: Soft, stretchy fufu served with a slimy, delicious okra soup.

name: Edikang Ikong
description: A rich vegetable soup made from fluted pumpkin leaves, waterleaf, and assorted meats.

name: Bitterleaf Soup (Ofe Onugbu)
description: A traditional soup made from washed bitter leaves and thickened with cocoyam paste.

name: Afang Soup
description: A delicious soup made from shredded afang leaves and waterleaf, often enjoyed with fufu or pounded yam.

name: Owo Soup
description: A native Delta soup made with palm fruit extract, potash, and assorted spices.

name: Ikokore (Water Yam Pottage)
description: A tasty pottage made from grated water yam, peppers, and spices.

name: Abacha (African Salad)
description: A traditional salad made from dried shredded cassava, garden eggs, and other ingredients.

name: Isi Ewu (Goat Head Soup)
description: A spicy delicacy made from goat's head, seasoned with traditional spices.

name: Ewa Agoyin
description: Softly boiled beans served with a spicy, pepper-rich sauce.

name: Ofe Owerri
description: A traditional soup made with assorted vegetables, meats, and thickened with cocoyam paste.
